trans-unit.source: Maps and location overview
trans-unit.target: Maps and location overview

trans-unit.source: This section explains how you can display maps, use map services, find the location, and set up a geofence in your app.
trans-unit.target: This section explains how you can display maps, use map services, find the location, and set up a geofence in your app.

trans-unit.source: This section also shows you how to launch the Windows Maps app to a specific map, route, or a set of turn-by-turn directions.
trans-unit.target: This section also shows you how to launch the Windows Maps app to a specific map, route, or a set of turn-by-turn directions.

trans-unit.source: Maps and location overview
trans-unit.target: Maps and location overview

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: This section explains how you can display maps, use map services, find the location, and set up a geofence in your app.
trans-unit.target: This section explains how you can display maps, use map services, find the location, and set up a geofence in your app.

trans-unit.source: This section also shows you how to launch the Windows Maps app to a specific map, route, or a set of turn-by-turn directions.
trans-unit.target: This section also shows you how to launch the Windows Maps app to a specific map, route, or a set of turn-by-turn directions.

trans-unit.source: **Tip** To learn more about using maps and location in your app, download the following samples from the [Windows-universal-samples repo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619979) on GitHub:
trans-unit.target: **Tip** To learn more about using maps and location in your app, download the following samples from the [Windows-universal-samples repo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619979) on GitHub:

trans-unit.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) map sample
trans-unit.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) map sample

trans-unit.source: UWP geolocation sample
trans-unit.target: UWP geolocation sample

trans-unit.source: Display maps
trans-unit.target: Display maps

trans-unit.source: Display maps with 2D, 3D, or Streetside views in your app by using APIs from the [**Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn610751) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Display maps with 2D, 3D, or Streetside views in your app by using APIs from the [**Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn610751) namespace.

trans-unit.source: You can mark points of interest (POI) on the map by using pushpins, images, shapes, or XAML UI elements.
trans-unit.target: You can mark points of interest (POI) on the map by using pushpins, images, shapes, or XAML UI elements.

trans-unit.source: You can also overlay tiled images or replace the map images altogether.
trans-unit.target: You can also overlay tiled images or replace the map images altogether.

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Request a maps authentication key
trans-unit.target: Request a maps authentication key

trans-unit.source: Your app must be authenticated before it can use the [MapControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services in the [Windows.Services.Maps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Your app must be authenticated before it can use the [MapControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services in the [Windows.Services.Maps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate your app, you must specify a maps authentication key.
trans-unit.target: To authenticate your app, you must specify a maps authentication key.

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to request a maps authentication key from the [Bing Maps Developer Center](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/) and add it to your app.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to request a maps authentication key from the [Bing Maps Developer Center](https://www.bingmapsportal.com/) and add it to your app.

trans-unit.source: Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views
trans-unit.target: Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views

trans-unit.source: Display customizable maps in your app by using the [MapControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) class.
trans-unit.target: Display customizable maps in your app by using the [MapControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) class.

trans-unit.source: This topic also introduces aerial 3D and Streetside views.
trans-unit.target: This topic also introduces aerial 3D and Streetside views.

trans-unit.source: Display points of interest (POI) on a map
trans-unit.target: Display points of interest (POI) on a map

trans-unit.source: Add points of interest (POI) to a map by using pushpins, images, shapes, and XAML UI elements.
trans-unit.target: Add points of interest (POI) to a map by using pushpins, images, shapes, and XAML UI elements.

trans-unit.source: Overlay tiled images on a map
trans-unit.target: Overlay tiled images on a map

trans-unit.source: Overlay third-party or custom tiled images on a map by using tile sources.
trans-unit.target: Overlay third-party or custom tiled images on a map by using tile sources.

trans-unit.source: Use tile sources to overlay specialized information such as weather data, population data, or seismic data; or use tile sources to replace the default map entirely.
trans-unit.target: Use tile sources to overlay specialized information such as weather data, population data, or seismic data; or use tile sources to replace the default map entirely.

trans-unit.source: Design guidelines for maps
trans-unit.target: Design guidelines for maps

trans-unit.source: The map control can display road maps and aerial views, directions, search results, and traffic.
trans-unit.target: The map control can display road maps and aerial views, directions, search results, and traffic.

trans-unit.source: Design guidelines for location-aware apps
trans-unit.target: Design guidelines for location-aware apps

trans-unit.source: Performance guidelines for apps that require access to a user's location.
trans-unit.target: Performance guidelines for apps that require access to a user's location.

trans-unit.source: Access map services
trans-unit.target: Access map services

trans-unit.source: Add routes, directions, and geocoding capabilities to your app by using APIs from the [**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Add routes, directions, and geocoding capabilities to your app by using APIs from the [**Windows.Services.Maps**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.

trans-unit.source: You can also help the user manage offline maps by launching the Settings app directly to the appropriate page.
trans-unit.target: You can also help the user manage offline maps by launching the Settings app directly to the appropriate page.

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Display routes and directions
trans-unit.target: Display routes and directions

trans-unit.source: Request routes and directions, and display them in your app.
trans-unit.target: Request routes and directions, and display them in your app.

trans-unit.source: Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding
trans-unit.target: Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding

trans-unit.source: Convert addresses to geographic locations (geocoding) and convert geographic locations to addresses (reverse geocoding) by calling the methods of the [MapLocationFinder](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class in the [Windows.Services.Maps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Convert addresses to geographic locations (geocoding) and convert geographic locations to addresses (reverse geocoding) by calling the methods of the [MapLocationFinder](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn627550) class in the [Windows.Services.Maps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.

trans-unit.source: Get the user's location
trans-unit.target: Get the user's location

trans-unit.source: Get the user's current location and be notified when the location changes in your app by using APIs from the [**Windows.Devices.Geolocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225603) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Get the user's current location and be notified when the location changes in your app by using APIs from the [**Windows.Devices.Geolocation**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br225603) namespace.

trans-unit.source: These API members are also frequently used in parameters of the maps APIs.
trans-unit.target: These API members are also frequently used in parameters of the maps APIs.

trans-unit.source: APIs from the [**Windows.Devices.Geolocation.Geofencing**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263744) namespace notifies your app when the user enters or exits a geofence (a predefined geographical area).
trans-unit.target: APIs from the [**Windows.Devices.Geolocation.Geofencing**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn263744) namespace notifies your app when the user enters or exits a geofence (a predefined geographical area).

trans-unit.target: Your app must be authenticated before it can use the [MapControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) and map services in the [Windows.Services.Maps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn636979) namespace.

trans-unit.source: To authenticate your app, you must specify a maps authentication key.
trans-unit.target: To authenticate your app, you must specify a maps authentication key.

trans-unit.source: Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding
trans-unit.target: Perform geocoding and reverse geocoding

trans-unit.source: Convert addresses to geographic locations (geocoding) and convert geographic locations to addresses (reverse geocoding) by calling the methods of the MapLocationFinder class.
trans-unit.target: Convert addresses to geographic locations (geocoding) and convert geographic locations to addresses (reverse geocoding) by calling the methods of the MapLocationFinder class.

trans-unit.source: Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views
trans-unit.target: Display maps with 2D, 3D, and Streetside views

trans-unit.source: Display customizable maps in your app by using the [MapControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) class.
trans-unit.target: Display customizable maps in your app by using the [MapControl](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn637004) class.

trans-unit.source: This topic also introduces aerial 3D and Streetside views.

trans-unit.source: Maps
trans-unit.target: Maps

trans-unit.source: The map control can display road maps and aerial views, directions, search results, and traffic.
trans-unit.target: The map control can display road maps and aerial views, directions, search results, and traffic.

trans-unit.target: Display points of interest (POI) on a map

trans-unit.target: Overlay tiled images on a map

trans-unit.target: Overlay third-party or custom tiled images on a map by using tile sources.

trans-unit.source: Use tile sources to overlay specialized information such as weather data, population data, or seismic data; or use tile sources to replace the default map entirely.

trans-unit.source: Set up a geofence
trans-unit.target: Set up a geofence

trans-unit.source: Set up a Geofence in your app, and learn how to handle notifications in the foreground and background.
trans-unit.target: Set up a Geofence in your app, and learn how to handle notifications in the foreground and background.

trans-unit.source: Launch the Windows Maps app
trans-unit.target: Launch the Windows Maps app

trans-unit.source: Your app can launch the Windows Maps app as shown here to display specific maps and turn-by-turn directions.
trans-unit.target: Your app can launch the Windows Maps app as shown here to display specific maps and turn-by-turn directions.

trans-unit.source: Rather than provide map functionality directly in your own app, consider using the Windows Maps app to provide that functionality.
trans-unit.target: Rather than provide map functionality directly in your own app, consider using the Windows Maps app to provide that functionality.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Launch the Windows Maps app](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt228341).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Launch the Windows Maps app](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/mt228341).

trans-unit.source: an example of the windows maps app.
trans-unit.target: an example of the windows maps app.
